contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 19, 2011 D SEWBBA (Blaenavon) Contest (Second Section)
SEWBBA (Blaenavon) Contest (Second Section) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Blaenavon) Contest sewbba-blaenavon-contest-second-section
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Workmen's Hall, Blaenavon Best instrumentalist: Iestyn Davies, cornet, Llwydcoed. Prizes - 1st £350, 2nd "50, 3rd £150. 5 bands competed.
Nov. 21, 2011, 1:35 p.m. July 1, 2020, 4:04 p.m.
1 Llwydcoed Band Gary Davies Rhapsody in Brass
2 Lewis Merthyr Band Gareth Pritchard Chorale and Variations [Lucas]
3 Gwaun-cae-Gurwen Band Colin Hogg Triptych [Sparke]
4 Briton Ferry Band Christian Jenkins Hollywood!
Withdrawn Cross Keys Junior Kerry Bowden
Withdrawn Treherbert & District Band Craig Roberts
